testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.Language_Test
testsuite.system-out: Test Scenario 1 : Verifying Spanish Language Click on Refresh button Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences option Select Office document and set as Default View Select Pdf Document and set as Default view Click on Apply button Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear. Click on Spanish Language Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Login EWA With User credential Click on Refresh button Click on Username Change Laguage in spanish and My Account Text is : Mi cuenta Verified My Account name in Spanish laguage Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear. Click on Logout Option Spanish Language verified Successfully

Click on Logout Option French Language verified Successfully
